When Answered Plea enters, discover 2. [i](Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value 2 or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)[/i]
Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, create a tapped and attacking token that’s a copy of it, except its a 2/2 white Angel with flying. Exile that token at the beginning of the next end step.
